mapper.update: update faq set content = #{content} where faq_id = #{faq_id}
mapper.select: select * from ( select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by id desc) as bbs_no, b.* from bbs b) bbs2 where bbs2.bbs_no between ${start} and ${end}
select * from faq where help_category_id = #{help_category_id} limit #{offset}, #{limit}
select * from faq where title like concat('%',#{search},'%')
